Class GameOfWildlife

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameOfWildlife
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameOfLife

    public class GameOfWildlife
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameOfLife
    advanced version of "Conway's Game of Life"; cells with dynamic color are used

      • getLiveNeighborsAndMixColor

        private int getLiveNeighborsAndMixColor(int x,
                                        int y,
                                        Cell c)
        determine how many of the 8 neighbors of a specific cell are alive and determine the average color of neighbors
        Parameters:
        x: - x position of cell
        y: - y position of cell
        c: - Cell object passed by reference to obtain mixed color
        Returns:
        amount of alive neighboring cells
